name: Strategies
subtitle: We maximize our conservation results by focusing on five key strategies critical for birds.

coasts.title: Coasts
coasts.description: We focus on four landscapes dominated by private lands where birds and habitat are most threatened: California’s Central Valley; the sagebrush ecosystem of the interior West; North American grasslands, including the Chihuahuan Desert; and eastern forests.
